mapper.sql: id, score, user_id as userId,`comment`,`system`, skill,star,area, updated_time as updatedTime, created_time as createdTime
mapper.insert: insert into teacher (score, comment, user_id, `system`, skill, star, area, pay) VALUES (#{score}, #{comment}, #{userId}, #{system}, #{skill}, #{star}, #{area}, #{pay})

insert into teacher (score, comment, user_id, `system`, skill, star, area,pay) VALUES
(#{item.score},#{item.comment},#{item.userId},#{item.system},#{item.skill},#{item.star},#{item.area},#{item.pay})
mapper.update: update teacher set score=#{score}, comment=#{comment}, `system`=#{system}, skill=#{skill}, star=#{star}, area=#{area}, pay=#{pay}, updated_time=now() where id = #{teacherId}
mapper.delete: delete from teacher where id in #{item}
delete from teacher where user_id in #{item}
mapper.select: select t.id as teacherId, t.score, t.user_id as userId,t.comment,t.system, t.skill,t.star,t.area, t.pay, u.education, u.id, u.name, u.idcard, u.phone, u.gender, u.position, u.age, u.birthday, u.category,u.head_img as headImg, u.wechat_id as wechatId, u.org_id as orgId, o.name as orgName, u.nation, u.nativeplace as nativePlace, u.politics from teacher t left join user u on t.user_id = u.id left join org o on u.org_id = o.id where 1=1 and u.name like '%${param}%' and t.skill = #{skill} and t.star = #{star} and t.system = #{system} and t.area = #{area} order by t.id desc

select t.score , t.comment , t.user_id as userId , t.system , t.skill , t.star , t.area , u.name , u.idcard as idCard , u.phone , u.gender , u.position , u.age , u.birthday , u.category , u.head_img as headImg , u.wechat_id as wechatId , u.org_id as orgId , u.nation , u.nativeplace , u.education , u.politics , t.id as teacherId from teacher t left join user u on t.user_id = u.id where t.id = #{teacherId}
select u.name from teacher t left join user u on t.user_id = u.id where t.id = #{teacherId}

select t.id , t.comment , t.skill , t.system , t.star , t.area , o.name as orgName , u.name , u.phone , u.gender , u.position , u.age , u.head_img as headImg , u.nation , u.nativeplace as nativePlace , u.education , u.politics from teacher t left join user u on t.user_id = u.id left join org o on o.id = u.org_id order by t.star, t.score desc limit 8
